item.description:
Another WordPress Meetup is coming up at the same time (last Wednesday of the month @ 7:00 PM) and same place (SkyTemple offices). While we will miss Kelly and Mel, WordPress continues to move on and there is plenty to learn and discuss for everyone whether you are a developer, designer or end-user.  Every week there are new themes, plugins, news and developments.

There are at least three possible topics for discussion/presentation at this meeting:

  1. Pagelines 2 Framework: learn more about this extensive responsive drag & drag framework that includes Twitter Bootstrap, custom post types, and it's own built-in store.
  2. ManageWP: Do you maintain multiple WordPress sites on different hosts? Then this tool may be for you. Learn how you can manage multiple sites in one place at the same time.
  3. WPEngine: get a behind the scenes look at this secure, scaleable and fast fully managed WordPress specific web host.

Please leave a comment about which one interests you the most. Time will also be set aside for your questions. Hopefully, as a group maybe we can offer some helpful answers or at least some educated guesses.

If you have a topic for discussion or want to give a presentation please let Ed Gray, the WordPress meetup organizer know.

Due to Halloween falling on the last Wednesday of October, October's WordPress Meetup will the next to last Wednesday of the month, October 24th.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 September WordPress Meetup
